name: Blue Canyon Kitchen & Tavern - Kalispell
review description: Good dining experience. Very nice people. Waiter was great!

name: The Boat Club Restaurant
review description: We celebrated a birthday at The Boat Club and had a wonderful dinner. The steaks were perfectly prepared, our server was superb (ask for Clayton!), and the music entertainment enjoyable.

name: By Word Of Mouth
address: 77 Aspen Leaf Dr Big Sky, MT  59716
review description: The SPINACH PAPPARDELLE was house made and hand cut tossed with matchstick vegetables, portabella mushrooms and tomatoes and finished with Marsala cream, parmesan & fresh basil oil and it was out of this world. I asked if the chef could add shrimp which he did without hesitation. It was truly amazing. The lava cake with homemade coffee ice cream was excellent. It was hard to believe the place was empty--the food was fantastic and the service was great. This place is a MUST!!!

name: finn & porter
address: Doubletree Missoula 100 Madison Street Missoula, MT  59802
review description: Always enjoy Finn and Porter every time we are in Missoula!

name: Montana Ale Works
review description: Really impressed by the warm welcome, cheerful service and wide choice of high quality Western food.

name: Pearl Caf√©
review description: Very well run restaurant from menu to service. Had the lamb and it was superb. We will definitely be back for another great dining experience.

name: Rainbow Ranch Lodge
review description: Great experience. We had a big group and good food even for the kids. Wagyu Montana rib eye was my favorite. Elk was quite good as well. Bison was just ok. I love dessert and the crepe cake and strawberry rhubarb was my fav. Recommended if you are around the Big Sky area.

name: Red Bird Restaurant
review description: We were very pleases with our experience at Red Bird. We dined in the formal dining area, but next time will probably just sit in the wine bar area. We used a gift certificate which had been mangled by our new puppy and was still graciously accepted. We will definitely go back, but stick to the less expensive wine bar menu, which really seemed to be more our style. However, the food was excellent, service was fantastic, and we very much enjoyed ourselves!
